function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Participants from different countries with varying levels of impact from COVID-19","Impact":"Potential for different levels of disease spread and economic impact","Mitigation":"Implement consistent public health measures and communication strategies","Technologies":"Remote work technology, video conferencing","People":"Participants in U.S. and Iran construction companies","Owner":"Public health organizations, employers, and government authorities"},{"Description":"Decreased working time for Group B participants in the initial survey round","Impact":"Potential economic impact and decreased productivity","Mitigation":"Provide support for impacted employees and monitor productivity levels","Technologies":"Remote work technology, productivity tracking tools","People":"Group B participants","Owner":"Employers and management"},{"Description":"Changes in remote work capabilities over survey rounds","Impact":"Shift in work patterns and potential implications for disease spread","Mitigation":"Provide resources for effective remote work, establish guidelines for safe working practices","Technologies":"Remote work technology, collaboration tools","People":"Participants in U.S. and Iran construction companies","Owner":"Employers and management"}]}
